body_text: What is the estimated age of Naruto when he became Hokage? On the last chapter of the manga version, Naruto became the Hokage. How old is he when he became Hokage?

How old were Naruto and Hinata when they had their children? How old were Naruto and Hinata when they had Bolt and later Himawari?
I have just been puzzled by the question and couldn't come to an answer.
